actions.caption:
If a time-controlled activation or deactivation of the machine is to be carried out, you can create a corresponding week program with the help of the button. It is created below the instance. It can then be set to your own requirements and stored as a time switch.
NOTE: An inactive week program is treated like a non-existent or selected timer!
